body_html:
Compared to commit 06fa332e2b285b1ac82df9200a83c22821812ab9 version. The running time of detectron training explodes!

caffe2 on commit 06fa332e2b285b1ac82df9200a83c22821812ab9, the running time is about 0.33s/iter. Details as following.

{"accuracy_cls": 0.803711, "eta": "0:43:54", "iter": 120, "loss": 1.639812, "loss_bbox": 0.526793, "loss_cls": 0.421929, "loss_mask": 0.533060, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn2": 0.000000, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn3": 0.005097, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn4": 0.066229, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn5": 0.012779, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn6": 0.000000, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn2": 0.000370, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn3": 0.031920, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn4": 0.013575, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn5": 0.006518, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn6": 0.000000, "lr": 0.004933, "mb_qsize": 64, "mem": 5392, "time": 0.334365}

caffe2 on commit 76f22b7aef9f1655f91606c3459498ec813f67f3, the running time is about 0.997s/iter!

son_stats: {"accuracy_cls": 0.803711, "eta": "2:10:59", "iter": 120, "loss": 1.612624, "loss_bbox": 0.506494, "loss_cls": 0.420890, "loss_mask": 0.523235, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn2": 0.000000, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn3": 0.006633, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn4": 0.066858, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn5": 0.011601, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn6": 0.000000, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn2": 0.000266, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn3": 0.030577, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn4": 0.017864, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn5": 0.004509, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn6": 0.000000, "lr": 0.004933, "mb_qsize": 64, "mem": 5106, "time": 0.997423}
body:
Compared to `commit 06fa332e2b285b1ac82df9200a83c22821812ab9` version. The running time of detectron training explodes!

caffe2 on `commit 06fa332e2b285b1ac82df9200a83c22821812ab9`, the running time is about **`0.33s/iter`**. Details as following.
```
{"accuracy_cls": 0.803711, "eta": "0:43:54", "iter": 120, "loss": 1.639812, "loss_bbox": 0.526793, "loss_cls": 0.421929, "loss_mask": 0.533060, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn2": 0.000000, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn3": 0.005097, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn4": 0.066229, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn5": 0.012779, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn6": 0.000000, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn2": 0.000370, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn3": 0.031920, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn4": 0.013575, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn5": 0.006518, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn6": 0.000000, "lr": 0.004933, "mb_qsize": 64, "mem": 5392, "time": 0.334365}
```
caffe2 on `commit 76f22b7aef9f1655f91606c3459498ec813f67f3`,  the running time is about **`0.997s/iter`**!
```
son_stats: {"accuracy_cls": 0.803711, "eta": "2:10:59", "iter": 120, "loss": 1.612624, "loss_bbox": 0.506494, "loss_cls": 0.420890, "loss_mask": 0.523235, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn2": 0.000000, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn3": 0.006633, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn4": 0.066858, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn5": 0.011601, "loss_rpn_bbox_fpn6": 0.000000, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn2": 0.000266, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn3": 0.030577, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn4": 0.017864, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn5": 0.004509, "loss_rpn_cls_fpn6": 0.000000, "lr": 0.004933, "mb_qsize": 64, "mem": 5106, "time": 0.997423}
```
